name: Svelte Hotel and Personal Suites

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Well located in Saket Select City Walk shopping centre, with all amenties, shops and good restaurants etc close to hand. Comfortable, clean, modern suites, with some very nice touches like bedside control panels controlling everything from lights to TV, to room service, to phone etc. Friendly. polite, helpful staff.Only had breakfasts, but those were good. I highlty recommend this hotel !
reviews.title: Excellent !
The Best Place to Live in New Delhi
reviews.text: Because of business I travel 9 months a year from New Zealand to USA and live in different hotels. As I started new business in Delhi 10 months ago I have been spending 20-25 days a month at Svelte. It is by far the best place to live in Delhi for several reasons. 1) You get a one bed room fully furnished apartment along with Reception, Travel Desk, 24 hours Room Service and House keeping which is rare in Delhi. 2) The apartments are done up really well with flat screen TVs, all the kitchen equipments and everything else what one requires. 3) The best part is its located above 3 most happening malls of Delhi (Select City Walk, DLF and MGF).

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: So when you're inside your apartment you get your space and privacy both but if you're bored just go to lobby level, enter the mall and you're in the middle of best possible place with best possible crowd!
reviews.title: It dint feel like we were in the middle of new delhi

reviews.text: The staff of Svelte is also very friends and co-operative. I would especially like to name people like Mr. Ramesh Uniyal, Ms. Veenu Rastogi and all the people at the front desk.
reviews.title: Amazing Place, True Luxury

reviews.text: I strongly suggest people to stay at Svelte with eyes shut regardless you're business or a leisure traveler and you will love the experience by all means.
reviews.title: Rude staff; dirty sheets

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We enjoyed our time at the Svelte. The entrance road is not brilliant - but that is not the fault of the hotel. Once in though it is peaceful, well appointed and very comfortable.
reviews.title: Lovely escape - a wee bit too far out of town for sightseeing

reviews.text: The room we had (610) was one of their 'basic' rooms but still had large lounge area and kitchen which we never used. Bathroom was spacious, spotless and well appointed. Bed was extremely comfortable - in fact one of the best hotel beds ever and certainly a bonus given the normally hard Indian mattresses elsewhere.
reviews.title: Comfortable suite hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Staff were all courteous. Breakfast was good, with a nice mix of western and Indian dishes.
reviews.title: Stay was Superb

reviews.text: I did not like the shopping centre attached - it was very very expensive and catered only for a tiny part of Indians.
reviews.title: Not worth it

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It was easy to get to the Metro - Autorickshaw should cost no more than 30 Rupees and never had a problem getting one back to the hotel. You need to ask the right desk in the Metro for a tourist day ticket - they may try and sell you a more expensive option.
reviews.title: Lovely accomodation, great location for the airport.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I stayed in this hotel for 4 nights. The rooms are nice & big. I was impressed by the cleanliness in the rooms & the living area. But the impression did not last long.
reviews.title: Rooms comfortable but the hotel staff cheats

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I had booked a king size double bed 2 weeks before my stay. I had even reconfirmed this & that I would be given a good view facing the mall entrance & the gardens. When I checked in I was given a twin bed facing the back of a dirty building. When I informed that this was not what I wanted, the front desk manager simply said we do not entertain requests like these. Whatever is available we give only that room regardless of what you have booked. I had even told them that I have a back problem due to which the separated beds do not suit me. The response was everything but polite.
reviews.title: Very Spacious and Luxurious Suites,

reviews.text: However after grueling for more than 2 hours, the next day they shifted us to a double bedroom.
reviews.title: Good Place to stay some weeks

reviews.text: But my horrifying experience did not end there. Upon checkout, they overcharged our mini bar bill showing use of Bar food, when we had no food. Also they charged us for a wine bottle which we had just put in the fridge from outside but had not even opened it. Just by putting a bottle in the fridge, we were charged an enormous amount for the wine we never even opened !
reviews.title: great extended stay place to stay

reviews.text: Upon haggling with front desk again, they did not help & out of frustration & in a hurry to get out, I just paid the amount & left.
reviews.title: Absolutely fantastic

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is located in one of the best malls in India.the lobby is small and it has just one restaurant,but there are plenty of good options in the mall and the other two hotels nearby.rooms are clean,modern.Good part are the big refrigerator and the microwave.Service was excellent.However furniture could have been more glamorous,but it does the job.Buffet breakfast was decent.
reviews.title: Nice Location,Service

reviews.text: This hotel we found outstanding. ALL the staff from the cleaners to the management were courteous and friendly - nothing was too much trouble for anyone! The rooms were large, clean, well maintained and had all requirements for our family ranging in age from 1 year to 62 years. The pool was clean and supervised. Refreshments were always available. Free parking available with security. Shopping precinct and restaurants just across the road. Amazing 10 day stay. Will return.
reviews.title: Apartments catering for all needs and ages

reviews.text: Location:
reviews.title: A good school of patience

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Located in Saket district, south of Delhi, within a commercial complex of several mall, the Svelte hotel will let me the feeling of a score in the middle. Last 300 meters access is on dusty non paved roads.
reviews.title: Excellent all suite hotel

reviews.text: Shopping malls are at the door, so it is convenient for shopping (mainly textile outlets) and surrounding walking distance restaurants are either junk food (Pizza Hut, KFC, Cinnabon, Indian Food Court) or restaurants of hotels (ITC Sheraton, Hilton Garden...).
reviews.title: Namaskar New Delhi

aka: Svelte Hotel And Personal New Delhi
